message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this unique product that's worth a lot to me. I'm willing to let it go for $20000, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $20000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $8000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $8000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $17000 to make this work.  Let's see if we can bridge the gap.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $17000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10000.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to go down to $15000, which is my absolute minimum.  I'm hoping we can find a way to make this work.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. $15000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to offer $12000. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
